10:16 <KermitTheFragger> is there a way to disable the WYSIWYG editor?  
10:16 <KermitTheFragger> wiki wide

12:36 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
12:36 <vmassol> has quit  
12:37 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
12:37 <vmassol> Enygma`: hi  
12:37 <mflorea> has quit  
12:38 <vmassol> Enygma`: how are you? Just to let you know I'm going to work on improving/packaging our syntax highlightinh/autocompletion project for this year's hackathon  
12:38 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
12:38 <evalica> has quit  
12:38 <evalica1> has joined #xwiki  
12:39 <evalica1> is now known as <evalica>  
12:46 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
12:47 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
12:52 <Enygma`> Hi vmassol  
12:52 <Enygma`> I`m also working on some minor refactorings  
12:52 <Enygma`> and also updating to the latest codemirror version  
12:53 <vmassol> cool, I figured that :)  
12:54 <Enygma`> I`ve just noticed that we can`t use velocity macros defined in macros.vm inside parsed JSX objects  
12:54 <Enygma`> that kind of sux... I wanted to have a common XWiki page with a few velocity variables/macros that I could use in the JSX objects  
12:55 <Enygma`> with #includeMacros(...)  
12:55 <Enygma`> maybe I can use $xwiki.includeForm($topic) instead (which is basically the body of includeMacros)  
12:57 <vmassol> Enygma`: indeed  
12:58 <Enygma`> hmm, I get "$xwiki is not defined"  
12:58 <Enygma`> wonder why it won`t interpret  
12:58 <Enygma`> first line in the jsx  
13:00 <vmassol> I can check later too, on something else right now  
13:15 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
13:25 <sburjan> has quit  
13:28 <Enygma`> nevermind, working now. I had a silent velocity error in my jsx.  
13:28 <vmassol> Enygma`: ok  
13:43 <Enygma`> has quit  
13:48 <vmassol> evalica: hi  
13:48 <vmassol> what is TestApp?  
13:48 <evalica> sorry :)  
13:48 <evalica> I was testing and I forgot I was on xwiki.org  
13:48 <vmassol> playground?  
13:48 <vmassol> ok  
13:49 <evalica> I wanted the list of users in the User displayers on AppWithinMinutes, but there is a bug with it on xwiki.org
